node.title: Wounded in the House of His Friends
node.description: The Seventh-day Adventist church held a ministerial institute and General Conference session in 1893. Like 1888 it was a significant event in our history. The signs of the times indicated that Jesus would soon return, and it appeared that a major revival was taking place. Something happened shortly after that seems to have changed direction. We will study this and why it is important to us today.
